item.title: GM and Ford shares drop after rival Stellantis cuts profit-margin view
China stocks just had their best day in 16 years, sending related U.S. ETFs soaring
item.description: The Shanghai Composite rallied 8.06% in its best day since September 2008.

item.title: Iran must choose between revenge and survival in response to Israel. Markets say it's choosing survival
item.description: Iran's leadership has vowed revenge, but its actions and language suggest — at least so far — a more measured response.

item.title: Google to invest $1 billion in Thailand to build a data center and accelerate AI growth
item.description: Google is investing 36 billion Thai baht ($1 billion) into Thailand to build a new data center and expand its cloud infrastructure, the company said M...

item.title: COVID sickens older adults most severely, but less than half say they’ll get the new vaccine
item.description: Your immune system weakens with age, and the more underlying medical conditions you have, the higher your chances of severe COVID, the CDC says.

item.title: UBS says ‘Roaring ‘20s’ scenario has taken shape and could be sustained

item.description: Bitcoin and crypto stocks retreated on the final trading day of September following a rally last week.

item.title: Amazon Prime Video event delivered good news for the stock, says Bank of America

item.title: This remarkable statistic demonstrates how broad Monday’s rally in China was
